column5: Hey gang, anyone here a certified Yamaha outboard mechanic? I may need someone to inspect a motor that I am considering.  Please let me know.  Thanks
co2 is the clsoest I can think in oakville

I wouldn't think that you'd need a factory certified yamaha mechanic to inspect a motor for purchase.  Any reliable marine mechanic should be able to do a compression test, leakdown, run it in a tank etc.
